<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_push_notif_msg_content"><sys_push_notif_msg_content action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><name>FAC Assigned to me</name><push_app display_value="ServiceNow Mobile Application">05ed2fb177002300258da2e2c81061c2</push_app><script><![CDATA[(function buildJSON(/*GlideRecord*/ current, /*String*/ message, /*Object*/ attributes) {

    var layoutFieldGenerator = new global.NotificationLayoutFieldGenerator();
    var identifier = layoutFieldGenerator.layoutField(current.sys_class_name, current.sys_id, "number");
    var description = layoutFieldGenerator.layoutField(current.sys_class_name, current.sys_id, "category");
    var status = layoutFieldGenerator.layoutField(current.sys_class_name, current.sys_id, "item");
    var json = {};
	var deepLinkGenerator = new global.MobileDeepLinkGenerator("Agent");
    var link = deepLinkGenerator.getFormScreenLink('d97941b6db98c810d91118df4b9619f8', current.getTableName(), current.getValue("sys_id"));
    json = {
        "aps" : {
            "sound" : "default"
        },
        "Link": link,
        "Layout" : {
            "Status": status,
            "Identifier" : identifier,
            "Description" : description
        }
    };
    
    return json;
    
})(current, message, attributes);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_push_notif_msg_content</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>sswartwood</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2020-01-07 18:11:02</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_id>e7f4520cdb9e0890d91118df4b9619b6</sys_id><sys_mod_count>5</sys_mod_count><sys_name>FAC Assigned to me</sys_name><sys_package display_value="FAC Management" source="x_tebc2_fac_manage">182118596f542200739d841dba3ee4f7</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="FAC Management">182118596f542200739d841dba3ee4f7</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_push_notif_msg_content_e7f4520cdb9e0890d91118df4b9619b6</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>sswartwood</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2020-01-10 17:58:04</sys_updated_on></sys_push_notif_msg_content></record_update>
